components.html:
The claim team will let you know they’ve received your claim within 5 working days. 

They’ll then process your claim within a further 15 working days and let you know the outcome.

They’ll contact you if there’s anything missing. If this happens, your claim may take longer.

If you need help with your claim you can call freephone 0808 196 1759 (outside UK: +44 1633 630904) or email [cff@gov.sscl.com](mailto:cff@gov.sscl.com).


## Support organisations

The following organisations give support and advice:

- [Child Bereavement UK](https://www.childbereavementuk.org/)
- [Cruse Bereavement Care](https://www.cruse.org.uk/)
- [Sands](https://www.sands.org.uk/)
- [Tommy’s](http://www.tommys.org/)

Give us your feedback on using this online service by emailing [claim.for.costs.of.a.childs.funeral@digital.justice.gov.uk](mailto:claim.for.costs.of.a.childs.funeral@digital.justice.gov.uk).
